description:
You're welcome in my cosy apartment : 1 living room, 1 bedroom, 1 kitchen and 1 bathroom.
I'd like you enjoy it when I have to travel. The neighborhood is amazing with tons of bars, pubs, cafés, restaurants. 
The apartment is on the 2nd floor and truely quiet since it's on the backyard.
The L station is really close to my apartment, like 1 minute by walk :) And a lot of busses. The G, M, J and Z trains are in 10 minutes by walk.
PS : smoking in the apartment is not allowed.
name: Cosy apt in the heart of Williamsburg/Bedford
review: Sylvain's place was perfect and in an amazing location. As a host, he was very communicative and accommodating. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a great Brooklyn experience.
